summary: Four frames of simultaneous action that alternately follow a smitten lesbian lover as she obsesses over her partner's dalliances and the tense goings-on of a Hollywood film production company.
cast: Xander Berkeley|Golden Brooks|Saffron Burrows|Viveka Davis|Richard Edson|Aimee Graham|Salma Hayek|Glenne Headly|Andrew Heckler|Holly Hunter|Danny Huston|Daphna Kastner|Patrick Kearney|Elizabeth Low|Kyle MacLachlan|Mía Maestro|Leslie Mann|Suzy Nakamura|Alessandro Nivola|Zuleikha Robinson|Julian Sands|Stellan Skarsgård|Jeanne Tripplehorn|Steven Weber|Holly Houston|Laurie Metcalf|Colette Divine|David Schatanoff Jr.|Patty Tobin
title: Timecode
